name: Lexical decision task dataset
description: An example demo for a PSA study proposal.

variableMeasured.name: sender
variableMeasured.description: Name of component or screen in the study that generated the current data row

variableMeasured.name: sender_type
variableMeasured.description: Type of component that generated the current data row

variableMeasured.name: sender_id
variableMeasured.description: Position of component in the study hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: timestamp
variableMeasured.description: Time and date of data storage

variableMeasured.name: time_end
variableMeasured.description: Frame timestamp at which component presentation ended

variableMeasured.name: time_render
variableMeasured.description: Frame timestamp at which component was rendered

variableMeasured.name: time_run
variableMeasured.description: Timestamp at which component was initialized

variableMeasured.name: time_show
variableMeasured.description: Frame timestamp at which component was shown on screen

variableMeasured.name: time_switch
variableMeasured.description: Frame timestamp at which the next component was shown

variableMeasured.name: url
variableMeasured.description: Page URL from which study was loaded
